forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High around 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 3C. ESE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 38F. ESE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 29F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 32F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
